      • generateUniqueCodesBatch

        void generateUniqueCodesBatch(CodeBatch codeBatch,
                              int numberOfCodesToGenerate,
                              String codePattern)
        Add a list of Code the the provided CodeBatch ; The value of the Code are created using the CodeGenerator
        Parameters:
        codeBatch - that holds the the created Code
        numberOfCodesToGenerate - the number of codes that will be generated
        codePattern - A pattern in format {4}-XYZ-{10}-BCD which generates code based on this format
